articles.content: Two months after being dropped from India's Test set-up, Cheteshwar Pujara is back knocking hard on the door of the selectors. Pujara has burned up the charts batting for Sussex in the County Champio… [+2291 chars]

articles.title: T20 World Cup 2022: 5 Pacers who are in contention to get picked in India squad for the tournament - CricTracker
articles.description: Here are the five pace bowlers who are in contention to get picked in India squad for T20 World Cup 2022 in Australia.
articles.content:
